name: Newspaper article Apocalypse
examine: Is the Apocalypse at our door?
Ramon Trump, 36, living in our suburbs, contacted us this morning to ask for help regarding the disappearance of his uncle and aunt, Miguel and Rachel Trump.
Yet always on top of technology, this couple does not answer any call or mail from their nephew. We tried to contact them, without success.
It was by going to their apartment that Ramon noticed their physical absence. This is the 5th case of physical and digital disappearance since the beginning of this month.
Are we all going to vanish? Are we closer to the cloud bang than ever?
